name: Cambridge Memorial Hospital
comment:
Community hospital with inpatient and outpatient clinics

Services include:
  • acute care
  • ambulatory services
  • continuing care and rehabilitation
  • family and child health
  • oncology
  • mental health
  • surgical services
  • fracture clinic
  • pain block clinic
  • sleep disorders clinic
  • spiritual care

Diagnostic imaging clinic on-site
  • x-ray
  • magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
  • computerized tomography (CT scan)

Emergency Department Wait Times: www.cmh.org/services/emergency-department/wait-time-clock

Services and Programs:
  • Ambulatory and Community Health - Seniors Health Services
  • Children's Care - Paediatrics
  • Diabetes Education Program
  • Emergency Department
  • Laboratory Services
  • Mental Health Services
  • Spiritual Care
  • Women and Children's Health

Community hospital with inpatient and outpatient clinics

Services include:
